Summary: My wife and I were returning home when we saw this bright disc desend into a cornfield
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Springfield
There were no other sightings in Springfield on or around February 23rd 1970
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I saw a glowing disc dessend into a cornfield at the junction of rt.29 and rt.136 at 2:30 on a monday morning,It freaked my wife out and she would not allow me to go into the field to check it out.I have encountered UFO"s three times,once as described above ,once in Tennesse,and once here in Colorado. We are not alone,thank God,it would be awful to think we are the only ones.
